Examples Gallery#

The examples below use opyrability’s functions/capabilities extensively for different tasks, such as:

  • Obtaining operability sets

  • Inverse mapping of operability sets

  • Evaluation of the Operability Index (OI)

  • Ranking of competing design/control structures using the OI as a metric

All functions are used simultaneously to achieve design and control assessment tasks in representative case studies.
